head.title: Login Screen

group.name: group1

userobject.inputstyle: width:247px; height:43px; border-width:1px; background-color:Transparent; color:Black; border-color:Transparent; text-align:left;

group.userobject: <input class="TextBox-S" id="UserID" name="UserID" style="width:250px;margin-bottom:5px;" type="text" placeholder="ID" maxlength="60" tabindex="0"> </br> <input type="password" class="TextBox-S" style="width:250px;" id="PassWD" name="PassWD" maxlength="200" tabindex="0" placeholder="Password"> <input type="hidden" name="MenuFile" value="http://tt-hpms-d10.bit.socionext.com/hpms/2016041114474CookieLoginInfo_CookieMgr.do" /> <input type="hidden" name="lang" value="jp" />
